member.name: MSIFILEHASHINFO
member.summary: TheMSIFILEHASHINFO structure contains the file hash information returned by and used in theMsiFileHash table.

member.name: MSIFILEHASHINFO.dwFileHashInfoSize
member.summary: Specifies the size, in bytes, of this data structure. Set this member to sizeof(MSIFILEHASHINFO) before calling the function.

member.name: MSIFILEHASHINFO.dwData
member.summary: The entire 128-bit file hash is contained in four 32-bit fields. The first field corresponds to the HashPart1 column of the MsiHashFile table, the second field corresponds to the HashPart2 column, the third field corresponds to the HashPart3 column, and the fourth field corresponds to the HashPart4 column.
